name: OddFruits
description:
WARNING! : You need friends to be able to play!

This is a multiplayer experience, albeit an unpolished one, so make sure to only play with people you trust with giving your IP address to since there is no public server function, you also need to be able to port forward, port 7777 should be open

OddFruits :

You die, and wake up, but somethings off.

you are not human, you can feel it, you try to move but no muscles contract, instead, your entire body rolls.

You find a nearby shiny surface and take a good look at yourself. This body isn't human.

You look to your right, there is a shadow, and then a creature. It looks humanoid, but you're not sure whether its human either.

Controls : 

shown in game

Another warning :

the game is incredibly unpolished, but it was definitely a learning experience, hopefully I will be able to make more and better quality multiplayer games in the future, so if you liked it, please comment!

Credit :

Chair - https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/wooden-kitchen-chair-0d28b5cefd684fdcb702b0a519bcd6ce

Monster model - https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/scary-creature-b996bf84da3d49edb52202cb4fab457c

Kitchen assets - https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-kitchen-assets-the-sims-4-style-1b4df6f...

Please report any bugs to me in the comments and I will try my best to fix them!
